definition: to spin (cotton or hemp etc)/fine woven silk fabric

sentences.english: Combination oiled nubuck leather upper with textile fabric accents.

sentences.english: The village now attracts businesses interested in shipping, steel, tobacco and textiles.

sentences.english: Won the "Sama educate award" in the area of garments industry.

sentences.english: Pieces of cotton in HANGING COFFIN discovered the first kind of cotton textiles in China.
sentences.chinese: 棺中的棉布殘片是中國迄今發現最早的棉紡織品實物。

sentences.english: The women who work with textiles steal thread so they can make their own clothes.
sentences.chinese: 紡織廠工作的女人會偷線來給自己做衣服。

sentences.english: Some of the first deals included an electric-equipment manufacturer and a textile exporter.
sentences.chinese: 首批協議中的一部分是用電設備製造商和紡織出口商。

sentences.english: Stabilized body care products, household products, textiles and fabrics.

sentences.english: The city has long been a center for the manufacture of textiles, lace, and hosiery.
sentences.chinese: 這城市長期爲紡織，花邊和針織內衣的製造業中心。

sentences.english: This machine is mainly used for falt clipping in textile trade.
sentences.chinese: 該機主要用於紡織企業對蓋板針布的包覆。

sentences.english: Answers were provided by Shanxi Hengtian New Textile Fiber Tech Co. Ltd.

sentences.english: The company is located in Changle city of Fuzhou, Fujian Province, the renowned "Textile City".

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To introduce the applications of textile technologies in pharmaceutics.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹紡織技術在藥劑學中的應用。
